verses.roman:
śuni' harṣe kahe prabhu--"kahile niścaya
yāṅhā haite kṛṣṇa-bhakti sei guru haya"

synonyms: śuni'-hearing; harṣe—in great jubilation; kahe prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; kahile niścaya—you have spoken correctly; yāṅhā haite—from whom; kṛṣṇa-bhakti—devotion to Kṛṣṇa; sei—that person; guru haya—is the spiritual master.
translation: Hearing Mukunda dāsa give this proper decision, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu confirmed it, saying,"Yes, it is correct. One who awakens devotion to Kṛṣṇa is certainly a spiritual master."
